title.base: What can I say? I just {love} to {code}.

body.base: Hi, I’m Yahya. I’m an {enthusiastic} who loves creating innovative software solutions. With expertise as a Full Stack Web Developer and Android Developer, I’ve worked across a wide range of technologies. I’m always eager to tackle new challenges and push the limits of what’s possible in tech, whether it’s building dynamic web apps or designing intuitive mobile experiences.

title.base: Here are some of the {services} I offer

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.body: Build highly interactive and intuitive mobile apps
mobile.details: I'm a mobile app developer with experience in building apps for both iOS and Android. I can help you create an app that will engage users and provide value to your business.

web.title: Web Development
web.body: Develop Solid, Reliable, Secure and Scalable Websites from scratch
web.details: I'm a web developer with experience in building websites for a variety of clients. I can help you create a website that will attract users and help you achieve your business goals.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.body: Design sweet UI with amazing detail to user experience
design.details: I'm a UI/UX designer with a passion for creating beautiful and intuitive designs. I have experience in designing websites, mobile apps, and other digital products. I can help you create a design that will make your product stand out and attract users.

title.base: So you wanna see my previous {projects}

form.body: How can I be of service?

select.title: Select Language
select.description: This website is available in multiple languages.
